          "parent_id": "626c6eae-0b67-4aa8-8dea-93ce9e43fb5b",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "static IEnumerable<string> EnumerateAllFilesOlderThan(\n                               TimeSpan maximumAge,\n                               string path,\n                               string searchPattern = \"*.*\",\n                               SearchOption options = SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly)\n{\n    DateTime oldestWriteTime = DateTime.Now - maximumAge;\n\n    return Directory.EnumerateFiles(path, searchPattern, options)\n        .Where(x => Directory.GetLastWriteTime(x) < oldestWriteTime);\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
